Text: I read a manga from your previous torrent just yesterday and that started me thinking about the rest of your collection.  Thanks for the upload!  It's much appreciated.

Unfortunatelly I can't check all of the collection, it's thousands and thousands of them.
If someone sees any problem with any of the comics, please tell me.
Question for you… are these raws or are they scanlations/official English releases? Either way, many thanks!
I think almost all of them are scans from the original and then translated to en.
